title: Art Rambles in the Highlands and Islands of Scotland ... With ... sketches, etc
author: Reid, John T.
snippet: The eastward view is also of interest, but I turn my eyes to the few cottagehomes that compose the village of Causeway Head, and single out the one onthe brae-head where I was boarded for three months when twelve years old.

title: Art Rambles in the Highlands and Islands of Scotland ... With ... sketches, etc
author: Reid, John T.
snippet: Very many juvenile excursionists crowded the roadbetween Stirling and Causeway Head.

title: Art Rambles in the Highlands and Islands of Scotland ... With ... sketches, etc
author: Reid, John T.
snippet: lunch, I took theroad that leads toCauseway Head, torenew acquaintancewith my old familiarfriend, Abbey Craig,now doubly endeared through havingon its summit a massive stone and limememorial of SirWilliam Wallace.
